Articles.Content:
So I like the fairings from KW rocketry, but they don't look good unless you build a rocket out of all KW parts. Would someone be willing to retexture the 1, 2, and 3 meter fairings with a nice, stockalike look?

Thank you!

SmallFatFetus
KW's fairings don't currently function as fairings with the stock drag model; getting them to function will likely require a plugin. That said -- I'll look at it if I have time.
